input_text: Manim-voiceover then splits your audio automatically and replaces the AI generated voice with your real recording.

input_text: By wrapping our animation inside a "with-statement", we ensure that once it finishes playing, it will also wait for the voiceover playback to finish.

input_text: We can retrieve the duration of the generated voiceover programmatically, and then use it to define for how long an animation should play.

    <voice name="en-US-AriaNeural">
